reviewText: Perfect video for Kayaking safety and basics.  This specific video was recommended in a kayaking book.  Seeing motion is ideal to reading text.  Includes easiest entering and exiting on land, into surf, how to carry kayak and all strokes, depending on currents and water flow.

I met Greg Barton several times and I am a kayaker.
This VHS helps me keep focus on my kayaking.
I would recommend this VHS to any kayaker.
